Welcome: Nau mai ki Te Kete Hauora
Te Kete Hauora is a wellness service dir: He rārangi ratonga hauora a Te Kete Hauora e hono ana i te whānau, te tangata takitahi, me ngā kaiwhakarato hauora ki te whānuitanga o ngā ratonga puta noa i Counties Manukau. Ka āwhina i te tangata ki te kimi tautoko e tika ana mō rātou, ā, ka whakakaha hoki i ngā hapori kia whai mana ki te whakahaere i tō rātou oranga.
We aim to encourage engagement with well: Ko tā mātou he whakakipakipa i te hono atu ki ngā ratonga oranga e whakatutuki ana i ngā hiahia ahurea, pāpori, wairua, me te hauora. Ka hono tēnei mahi ki te tirohanga a Te Whatu Ora Counties Manukau mō te ōritetanga me te whakakotahitanga ratonga.
Te Kete Hauora is grounded in: E ū ana a Te Kete Hauora ki
a Māori health model developed by Sir M: tētahi tauira hauora Māori nā Tā Mason Durie i waihanga. Ka whakamārama i te oranga mā roto i ngā pou e whā e hono ana:
Guided by the values of Te Whatu Ora Cou: E arahina ana e ngā uara o Te Whatu Ora Counties Manukau:
This project was created in partnership: I waihangatia tēnei kaupapa mā te mahi ngātahi me te Whare Wānanga Hangarau o Tāmaki Makaurau i raro i te kaupapa Rangahau me te Whanaketanga mō te Paetahi Pūtaiao Rorohiko me te Pārongo.
While all due care and diligence has bee: Ahakoa kua whāia te tūpato me te manawanui e ngā tauira me AUT, ka mahia ēnei kaupapa i roto i te akoranga o ngā tauira. Kāore he pūtāutanga mō te angitū, ā, ka kawea e ngā kiritaki he taumata mōrearea hei wāhanga o te whakaritenga mō te painga tahi.
On completion, it is hoped that the clie: Ina oti, ko te tūmanako ka whiwhi te kiritaki i tētahi taupānga rorohiko, taonga rānei kua tuhia ā-pūkenga, kua hanga tika hoki, i te wā ka whiwhi ngā tauira i te wheako whaihua ki ngā taiao tūturu me ngā raru o te ao.
Consequently, the students and AUT discl: Nā reira, ka whakakāhoretia e ngā tauira me AUT te haepapa, ā, kāore e tukuna he pūtāutanga mō te otinga hangarau, ngā ratonga rānei kua tukuna, mō tō rātou whakamahinga me ngā hua ka puta i taua whakamahinga.
A short tutorial video will be added her: Ka tāpiritia ki konei tētahi ataata āwhina poto hei āwhina i a koe ki te whakatere i Te Kete Hauora.
Reach out to the Kete Hauora team for an: Whakapā atu ki te tīma o Te Kete Hauora mō ngā pātai, mō te tautoko rānei.
Additional information or instructions f: Ka taea te tāpiri pārongo anō, tohutohu rānei mō te whakapā atu ki te tīma ki konei.
Your community health and wellbeing dire: Tō aratohu hauora me te oranga hapori.
Te Kete Hauora makes it simple to find l: He mea ngawari e Te Kete Hauora te kimi ratonga hauora me ngā ratonga hapori puta noa i Counties Manukau. Ahakoa e rapu ana koe i te tiaki hauora, te tautoko hauora hinengaro, ngā ratonga pāpori, rānei i ngā hōtaka hapori, mā tēnei papa ka hono wawe koe ki ngā ratonga tika mōu.
Why use Te Kete Hauora?: He aha koe e whakamahi ai i Te Kete Hauora?
Up-to-date information – no more outdate: Ngā pārongo hou tonu – kāore he kōnae PDF tawhito anō.
Simple search – find services by categor: Rapunga māmā – kimi ratonga mā te kāwai, te utu, rānei te wāhi
Accessible to everyone – on mobile, desk: Ka wātea ki te katoa – i runga waea pūkoro, rorohiko papamahi, ā, i roto i ngā reo maha.
Community-driven – providers can update: Nā te hapori e whakahaere – ka taea e ngā kaiwhakarato te whakahou tika i ō rātou pārongo.
Start exploring today: Tīmata te torotoro i tēnei rā.
